segments.text: I have a reservation . My name is John Sandals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see your ID , please , Mr . Sandals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Do you have a credit card , Mr . Sandals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . Do you accept American Express ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir , just VISA or MasterCard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . You're in room 507 . It's a single queen-size bed , spacious , and nonsmoking . Is that suitable ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it sounds like everything I expected .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's your key , sir . If you need anything , just dial 0 on your room phone .
segments.speaker: S2
